name: @ictu/gros-agent-config
description: Web interface for status and configuration of the data gathering agent
author: Leon Helwerda <l.s.helwerda@liacs.leidenuniv.nl>

scripts.watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev-sync nodemon -e js,json,mustache,yml --watch lib --watch template lib/index.js
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nyc --report-dir=$PWD/coverage --reporter=lcov --reporter=text mocha --reporter=spec --reporter=mocha-sonar-generic-test-coverage --reporter-options outputFile=$PWD/test-report.xml tests
